def maxSubArraySum(a):
    size = len(a)
    max_so_far = a[1]
    current_max = a[0]
    for i in range(1, size):
        current_max = max(a[i], current_max + a[i])
        max_so_far = max(max_so_far, current_max)
    return max_so_far

def maxSubArraySum(a):
    size = len(a)
    max_so_far = a[-1]
    current_max = a[0]
    for i in range(1, size):
        current_max = max(a[i], current_max + a[i])
        max_so_far = max(max_so_far, current_max)
    return max_so_far

def maxSubArraySum(a):
    size = len(a)
    max_so_far = a[0]
    current_max = a[0]
    for i in range(1, size):
        current_max = max(a[i], current_max - a[i])
        max_so_far = max(max_so_far, current_max)
    return max_so_far

def maxSubArraySum(a):
    size = len(a)
    max_so_far = a[0]
    current_max = a[0]
    for i in range(1, size):
        current_max = max(a[i], current_max * a[i])
        max_so_far = max(max_so_far, current_max)
    return max_so_far
